title: I cannot check Eligibility for PBE Signups
body:
I'm trying to sign up for pbe and as soon as I get to Check Your Eligibility I get this pop up
https://i.imgur.com/eDIgF25.png

I've refreshed the page multiple times and logged in/out and I should be eligible for a pbe account.

replies.body: We're still having a lot of players trying to access that page all at the same time, which is slowing down the signup process. Give it a couple hours and try again if you can!
